helpEmbed.argsFooter: Use 🤷 as a command argument to see more info!

descriptions.addemoji: Add an emoji to your server by an URL
descriptions.clear: Delete specific messages in the channel
descriptions.counter: Show the total members in your server in a chat topic
descriptions.nowplaying: Shows the information from the current music
descriptions.play: Play a song from an URL or searching it
descriptions.spotify: See the current spotify music information of a user
